mapper.select: SELECT b.book_id AS bookId, b.title, b.author, b.publisher, DATE_FORMAT(b.published_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS publishedDate, DATE_FORMAT(b.created_at, '%Y-%m-%d') AS createdAt, bi.image_url AS imageUrl FROM Books b LEFT JOIN BookImages bi ON b.book_id = bi.book_id ORDER BY b.book_id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Books (title, author, publisher, published_date,isbn,description) VALUES (#{title}, #{author}, #{publisher}, #{publishedDate},#{isbn},#{description})
mapper.select: SELECT b.book_id AS bookId, b.title, b.author, b.publisher, b.published_date AS publishedDate, b.isbn, b.description, bi.image_url AS imageUrl FROM Books b LEFT JOIN BookImages bi ON b.book_id = bi.book_id WHERE b.book_id = #{bookId}
mapper.update: UPDATE Books SET title = #{title}, author = #{author}, publisher = #{publisher}, published_date = #{publishedDate}, isbn = #{isbn}, description = #{description}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE book_id = #{bookId}
